LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_GuardstructGenerator: An uninitialized synstruct wolf-analogue designed for guard, assault, search and destroy, and support duties. Guardstructs are intelligent drones and capable of charging.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_ConvoystructGenerato: An uninitialized mechanical tortoise-analogue designed for both short and long range transportation services. Convoystructs are intelligent drones and capable of charging.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_SteelstructGenerator: An uninitialized mechanical sheep-analogue designed for producing steel. This unit necessitates organic matter consumption, and can not charge.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_NutristructGenerator: An uninitialized mechanical cow-analogue designed for producing high-grade high-efficiency milk. This synstruct requires organic matter consumption, and can not charge.
An uninitialized mechanical hen-analogue designed for producing neutroamine or chemfuel precursors. The process requires fats and compounds derived from meat, and cannot charge.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_RazorstructGenerator: An uninitialized mechanical drone designed for swarming targets. They have a severely limited battery lifespan, yield nothing when destroyed, and attack anything else.
